sqlMap.select: SELECT i.group, i.group_name, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments, u.user_realname, u.user_homepage, u.user_name FROM groupids i, user u WHERE i.group > 2 AND i.group_name = u.user_name ORDER BY i.group_name LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT i.group, i.group_name, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments, u.user_realname, u.user_homepage, u.user_name FROM groupids i, user u WHERE i.group_name = #groupname# AND i.group_name = u.user_name

SELECT i.group, i.group_name, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments, u.user_realname, u.user_homepage, u.user_name FROM groupids i, groups g, user u WHERE group_name = #groupname# AND i.group = g.group AND i.group > 2
AND u.user_name = g.user_name

(SELECT i.group_name, i.group, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments FROM groups g, groupids i WHERE g.user_name = #username# AND g.group=i.group) UNION (SELECT i.group_name, i.group, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments FROM groupids i WHERE i.group BETWEEN 0 AND 2) ORDER BY `group`
SELECT DISTINCT i.group, i.group_name, i.privlevel, i.sharedDocuments FROM groupids i, tas T WHERE T.content_id = #contentId# AND T.group = i.group
SELECT MAX(`group`) + 1 AS id FROM groupids

SELECT g.group FROM groupids g groups i WHERE g.group_name = #name#
i.user_name = #user.name# AND i.group = g.group
SELECT set_name, tag_name from group_tagsets s LEFT JOIN groups g ON (s.group = g.group) WHERE g.user_name = #groupname#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO groupids (group_name, `group`, privlevel, sharedDocuments) VALUES (#name#, #groupId#, #privlevel#, #sharedDocuments#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM groups WHERE `group` = #groupId# AND user_name = #name#
